name: 1 meter (mobile support)
description:
In this game, you're a piece of pasta and you try to increase to crazy lengths! 

Btw, I know this game isn't the best. if you want, you can check out my other games. Now, I'm GOING to update this game. But it will be a BIG update. 

Tap to rotate clockwise, otherwise, you rotate counter-clockwise. Don't hit your own noodle or the edge.

This game is inspired by the classic game "1 Meter"

TYSM to @bwthyylol for proposing this to be featured!
